fr.lip6.jkernelmachines.kernel.typed

Class DoubleHPolynomial

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.lip6.jkernelmachines.kernel.Kernel<double[]>
      • fr.lip6.jkernelmachines.kernel.typed.DoubleHPolynomial
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class DoubleHPolynomial
extends Kernel<double[]>
    Homogenous Polynomial kernel on double arrays. return (x'y)^d, where d = 2 by default
    Author:
    David Picard
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
